item.description: Microsoft and Nvidia team up to train one of the worldâ€™s largest language models (7 minute read) Microsoft and Nvidia have trained what they claim is the largest and most capable AI-powered language model to date.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-17
item.description: Apple has reportedly considered launching its own primary healthcare service (2 minute read) Apple has plans to launch a subscription-based healthcare service.
